comment.author: 29056926@N02
comment._content: The women are riding down "Helter Skelter", a slick bamboo ride. We're looking at the Tower in the center of Luna Park. Suggestified using this map.

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/tigerzombie] Yes -- one from the same collection posted for a special project and exhibition in 2008: "Goodbye Coney Island." Read Patrick's blog posts about the show. Deb Wythe Digital Lab
